attributes.action: Government Help for Young First Time Buyers
attributes.additional_details:
Provide more help for young people trying to get on the property ladder- With the majority of young people earning 25k or under its impossible to get a mortgage or deposit to buy a house without parental help.

With the Council and various Associations housing lists increasing rapidly with the amount of unemployed or benefit claimants- the people who work hard and earn a living have no chance of a home.

Trying to survive as a young member of society is a great difficulty and something should be done to help us! We are the future of today and if something isn't done to help where will we all end up!

Sign this petition and show your support for the hard working youth of today!
